entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
